com.cz.library.widget

Class CenterTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • com.cz.library.widget.CenterTextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BadgerTextView

    public class CenterTextView
extends android.widget.TextView
    TextView封装类,用于CompoundDrawable与文字同时居中,以及针对CompoundDrawable的尺寸限定 实现思路,架空textView的text以及CompoundDrawable,自己绘制方位,控制大小

    Created by cz on 2014/6/3

    update 2015/11/10;重写思路, 架空textView的text以及CompoundDrawable, 自己绘制方位, 控制大小
